summary: Frontend testing of Pi-Ready Deployment features: Hash routing, System Status Panel, Quick Tools Bar scroll fix, and Admin Console Audit Panel. All 5 major features tested successfully.

issues: API fetch errors for undefined endpoints (expected - backend is mocked): undefined/cgi-bin/health.py, undefined/api/hotspot/status, etc. This is expected behavior when backend is not connected.

critical_code_review_comments: Hash routing (HashRouter) correctly implemented in App.js for Pi deployment
System Status Panel shows all required sections: BUILD INFO, CONNECTION STATUS, CONFIGURATION, ENDPOINT STATUS
View Audit Report link in System Status Panel correctly opens Audit Panel (lazy loaded)
Admin Console has Audit tab button (data-testid='audit-tab-btn') that opens Capability Coverage Audit panel
Audit Panel shows coverage stats (Implemented/Mocked/Missing), UI Inventory, Backend Endpoint Coverage, Feature Parity sections
Quick Tools Bar scrolls horizontally on mobile (375px) without buttons being cut off - proper padding implemented
test_credentials: None required - all data is mocked
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Pi-Ready Deployment features tested and working. Key test IDs: system-status-btn, admin-console-btn, audit-tab-btn, audit-link-btn, quick-tools-bar, tool-quickguide, tool-calculator. Hash routing verified at URL /#/. Audit Panel uses React.lazy() so needs ~5 seconds to load.

hash_routing.details: URL correctly shows /#/ when using HashRouter - verified at https://omegasight.preview.emergentagent.com/#/

system_status_button.details: System Status button found in header (data-testid='system-status-btn' or text='Status')

system_status_panel_build_info.details: BUILD INFO section shows Version: dev, Environment: development, Built timestamp

system_status_panel_connection_status.details: CONNECTION STATUS section shows 'Not Connected' with 'No successful connection yet'

system_status_panel_configuration.details: CONFIGURATION section shows API Base, Kiwix Base, Data Source: MOCK DATA

system_status_panel_endpoint_status.details: ENDPOINT STATUS section is expandable and shows health, metrics, sensors endpoints

system_status_view_audit_report_link.details: 'View Audit Report' link found in System Status panel header (data-testid='audit-link-btn')

system_status_run_self_test.details: 'Run Self Test' button found in System Status panel footer

system_status_copy_debug_info.details: 'Copy Debug Info' button found in System Status panel footer

admin_console_audit_tab.details: Audit tab button found in Admin Console (data-testid='audit-tab-btn') with amber/orange styling

audit_panel_title.details: Capability Coverage Audit panel opens with 'UI vs Backend Parity Report' subtitle

audit_panel_summary_stats.details: Summary stats show: 3 Implemented, 13 Mocked, 12 Missing, 11% Coverage

audit_panel_ui_inventory.details: A) UI Inventory section shows 15 components with Page/Section, Component Path, Data Mode (MOCK badges), Planned Endpoint

audit_panel_endpoint_coverage.details: B) Backend Endpoint Coverage section shows 8 endpoints with REQUIRED tags and 'Run Tests' button

audit_panel_feature_parity.details: C) Feature Parity Checklist section available (expandable)

audit_panel_copy_report.details: 'Copy Report' button found in Audit Panel header

quick_tools_bar_mobile_scroll.details: Quick Tools Bar scrolls horizontally on mobile (375px width) - 7 buttons total, scrollWidth: 860px, containerWidth: 375px. Last button visible after scrolling (not cut off).

mocked_apis_list: All Pi backend endpoints (health, metrics, sensors, hotspot, etc.)
All panel data is mocked - MOCK DATA badges display correctly
